title: U.S. population share by generation 2018
summary: This chart shows the Population of share made by Generations in a by generation .
\\n From the chart we see that the The_Baby_Boomer_Generation_(born_1946-1964) Generations was the U.S. population Generations in the generation with 27.68 share .
The next Generations to make the most share was the Generation_X_(born_1965-1980) Generations with 20 share closely followed by the Generation_Z_(born_1997_and_later) Generations with 27.68 share .
gold: The statistic depicts the distribution of the U.S. population in 2018 , by generation . In that year , Millennials made up about 22 percent of the population in the United States .
